/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, providing a driver's eye view of the cityscape. The street is flanked by buildings and power lines, creating a sense of urban density. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with white clouds, adding a serene contrast to the busy street below. In the distance, a large hill blanketed in greenery serves as a natural counterpoint to the concrete structures. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and the vastness of the sky. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the hill and the blue of the sky standing out against the more muted tones of the buildings and road.
